parameters.formDescription: Enter two CSV file paths (reachable by the FastAPI server), join columns, and join type.

parameters.content:
Node 0 (Merge CSV) → You can connect it to:
- Node 2 (Download merged CSV)
- Node 3 (Infer column types)

Node 1b (Inference Column Types) → You can connect it to:
- Node 2a (View Column Types)
- Node 2b (Cleaned Column Visualization)

Node 1c (LLM Cleaning) → You can connect it to:
- Node 2b (Cleaned Columns Visualization)
- Node 2c (View Cleaned DataFrame)

Node 1d (Manual Cleaning) → You can connect it to:
- Node 2c (View Cleaned DataFrame)

nodes.name: 0) Merge CSV
nodes.notes: You can connect this to Node 2 (download) or Node 3 (inference)

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({
  data: $node["0) Merge CSV"].json.data,
  params: {
    "Select Preprocessing Step(s)": $node["Form1"].json["Select Preprocessing Step(s)"],
    "Scale: min_value": $node["Form1"].json["Scale: min_value"],
    "Scale: max_value": $node["Form1"].json["Scale: max_value"],
    "Impute: strategy": $node["Form1"].json["Impute: strategy"],
    "Impute: fill_value (used when strategy=constant)": $node["Form1"].json["Impute: fill_value (used when strategy=constant)"],
    "Binarize: threshold": $node["Form1"].json["Binarize: threshold"],
    "Remove Outliers: iqr_multiplier": $node["Form1"].json["Remove Outliers: iqr_multiplier"],
    "NaN Threshold for Column Removal": $node["Form1"].json["NaN Threshold for Column Removal"],
    "NaN Threshold for Row Removal": $node["Form1"].json["NaN Threshold for Row Removal"],
    "SMOTE: target_column": $node["Form1"].json["SMOTE: target_column"],
    "SMOTE: sampling_strategy": $node["Form1"].json["SMOTE: sampling_strategy"],
    "SMOTE: k_neighbors": $node["Form1"].json["SMOTE: k_neighbors"]
  }
}) }}
